escape-html

/**
 * Escape special characters in the given string of html.
 *
 * @param  {String} html
 * @return {String}
 * @api private
 */

module.exports = function(html) {
  return String(html)
    .replace(/&/g, '&amp;')
    .replace(/"/g, '&quot;')
    .replace(/'/g, '&#39;')
    .replace(/</g, '&lt;')
    .replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
}
